medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening abdominal pain, diffuse in nature but worst in RLQ.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms started around noon yesterday, with about 24 hours of worsening abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting. He has had no appetite since yesterday morning. The pain is alleviated by staying still and is exacerbated by movement and lying flat.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of kidney stones; no history of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD).
